content.subtitle: Introduction to the topic of Machine Learning (ML)
content.details: The meeting began with a brief introduction to Machine Learning, explaining its importance and growing presence across various industries like healthcare, finance, and e-commerce.

content.subtitle: Purpose of the Meeting
content.details: To provide an overview of what ML is, its types, and real-world applications. The session aimed at demystifying ML for beginners and setting the stage for deeper dives in future sessions.

content.subtitle: Definition
content.details: Machine Learning is a subset of Artificial Intelligence (AI) focused on building systems that can learn from data and improve over time without explicit programming.

content.subtitle: Key Concepts
details: Algorithms: Mathematical procedures or rules that help make decisions or predictions based on data.
Training: Feeding data to an algorithm so it can learn patterns.
Prediction: Using learned patterns to make decisions or predict outcomes on new data.

content.subtitle: Example
content.details: Email spam filters, recommendation systems (Netflix, Amazon), and voice assistants like Siri or Alexa.
